definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: At their basic level, they're crystalline.
sentences.chinese: 它們在基礎階段是結晶狀的。

sentences.english: Natural gas hydrate is a kind of simple crystalloid solid hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 天然氣水合物是一種結晶狀固態簡單化合物。

sentences.english: Add sixteen cubes of sugar and wait until the sauce crystallizes .
sentences.chinese: 在調味汁中加進16個方塊糖，等到調味汁成結晶狀。
